title: What Makes 'A Teacher' Compelling TV
description:
Bill Simmons and Mallory Rubin explain what makes 'A Teacher' such compelling TV. This episode contains spoilers for Episode 7 of 'A Teacher.'

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Mallory Rubin
